name: RUSH HOUR (itch) (TheAfterWorld)
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow Keys (to move), Spacebar (honk horn for no reason)

NOTES:  Open the "exe" file not the "orig" file...that was just put there so it can run on later versions of Windows.

Published in 2002, RUSH HOUR was the first game I had ever made using Gamemaker 7. It very much looks like a mod from one of the Gamemaker sample games, however I actually scripted everything myself, from scratch. The game used to be uploaded on the Yoyogames website until the site was updated and unfortunately taken down. It had a 4/5 star rating and someone actually made a sequel called "Rush Hour Two Player" but unfortunately that one wasn't rated that high and you definitely could tell it was just a mod from the GM sample game. Looking back, I'm actually quite proud of this being my first game I ever made :).
HOPE YOU ENJOY IT TOO!
